age and include difficulty running, climbing steps, or rising from a chair. The lower extremities are most often affected. Complications include scoliosis and chronic shortening of muscles or tendons around joints.",NINDS,Spinal Muscular Atrophy
What are the treatments for Spinal Muscular Atrophy ?,There is no cure for SMA. Treatment consists of managing the symptoms and preventing complications.,NINDS,Spinal Muscular Atrophy
